thread.title: BRIEF-Manipal Hospitals Promoter Ranjan Pai To Meet Key Minority Shareholders Of Fortis On Monday - ET Now Citing Sources

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Manipal Hospitals Promoter Ranjan Pai To Meet Key Minority Shareholders Of Fortis On Monday - ET Now Citing Sources
text:
April 9 (Reuters) -
* MANIPAL HOSPITALS PROMOTER RANJAN PAI TO MEET KEY MINORITY SHAREHOLDERS OF FORTIS ON MONDAY - ET NOW CITING SOURCES
* MANIPAL HOSPITALS PROMOTER PAI TO MEET RAKESH JHUNJHUNWALA, OTHER HIGH NET WORTH INDIVIDUALS & YES BANK TO ADDRESS CONCERNS AROUND DEAL - ET NOW CITING SOURCES
* MANIPAL HOSPITALS PROMOTER PAI OPEN TO SWEETENING TERMS OF FORTIS DEAL IF REQUIRED BASED ON SHAREHOLDERSâ€™ FEEDBACK - ET NOW CITING SOURCES
* MANIPAL HOSPITALS PROMOTER PAI ALSO REACHED OUT TO EAST BRIDGE CAP, BLACKROCK ON REVISED DEAL STRUCTURE & VALUATION - ET NOW CITING SOURCES Source text: bit.ly/2JsWwCh Further company coverage:
